English.Text:
Your crew escape! The engine room take the initiative ahead of orders the bridge and stoke the fires. The ship picks up just, just enough extra speed to avoid the mountain of ice crashing down into the channel. Waves from this rare natural event form a new avenue leading out to the open sea.

The crew enters King William Sound, a majestic carpet of water leading up to its seat, King William Island. Sensing something, Lady Faithful suddenly emerges from below deck, and voices the determined hopes of her heart...
